instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3209: What is 820-3209? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U7000: What is U7000? U7000 refers to the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging IC on Macbooks from 2008-2012.
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: It was liquid damage around everywhere but works ok ,I replaced all part which should be replaced ,now only problem is that charging battery is over 10 hours,try another battery same ,replaced <CHIP>U7400</CHIP> same thing ,check all resistors and measure them ok ???

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: Check the usual, resistance between pins 17/18, 27/28 of the <CHIP>ISL6259</CHIP>? Also check <TRANSISTOR>Q7055</TRANSISTOR> and the gate pin 4 trace to <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: pins 27/28 resistance is 21 ,17/18 is 2.1 ,<TRANSISTOR>Q7055</TRANSISTOR> trace ok to <CHIP>U7000</CHIP>,

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: Replace <TRANSISTOR>Q7055</TRANSISTOR>. Is PPBUS at 8.6V when battery disconnected? You using the correct A1405 battery model?

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: Already replaced <TRANSISTOR>Q7055</TRANSISTOR> ,no change battery is A1496 ,dont think that battery can cause this ,before I use different battery for Macbook air no problem

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A battery charging time more then 10 hours
threads.message: I'm not sure but the machine needs an A1405. Try that first before wasting more time.
